## 👩‍💻 About Me

I’m a Software Development Engineer at Amazon and a Master’s student in Computer Science, driven by a passion for building **AI-powered systems** that make complex tasks simple, explainable, and impactful.

With hands-on experience across research, development, and deployment, I specialize in:

- **Machine Learning & Deep Learning** for real-world applications  
- **AI-Enhanced System Design** (RAG, NLP, Database Optimization)  
- **Full Stack Development** (React, Node.js, Tailwind, PostgreSQL)

Whether it’s optimizing SQL with AI or detecting phishing emails with LLMs, I love solving high-stakes problems with elegant solutions — and I’m always learning.

---

## 🚀 Projects

> _My top projects will be public soon!_

- **Arabic RAG System** – Cross-dialect retrieval augmented generation using DeepSeek & avatar agents
- **AI-Powered DB Optimizer** – Real-time SQL analysis with natural language feedback via LLMs
- **Phishing Detector** – Full-stack LLM-based email threat detector with human evaluation metrics  

🔒 Stay tuned as I open-source these soon!

---

## 🌱 Currently Exploring

- Advanced LLM workflows and agentic reasoning  
- Cloud-scalable AI architectures  
- Research-backed engineering for security and performance
